mapper.select: SELECT (IFNULL(( SELECT MAX(CAST(SUBSTR(ASSET_NO,5,4) AS UNSIGNED)) ASSET_NUM FROM RFID_ASSET WHERE ASSET_NO LIKE concat(#{assetTypeCd},#{aqusitYearShort},'%') ),0) + 1) ASSET_NUM FROM DUAL

SELECT ast.* ,(CASE WHEN ast.ASSET_STATUS_CD = '가자산' THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y' END) AS ASSET_REGI_YN ,(CASE WHEN ast.TAG_PRINT_CNT > 0 THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END) AS PRINT_YN ,insa.INSP_DT ,insa.INSP_USER_NAME ,insa.INSP_REMARK FROM rfid_asset ast LEFT OUTER JOIN rfid_insp_asset insa ON ast.ASSET_SEQ = insa.ASSET_SEQ WHERE 1=1
SELECT count(*) FROM rfid_asset ast WHERE 1=1

mapper.update: UPDATE RFID_ASSET SET ASSET_STATUS_CD = '정상' ,AQUSIT_DT = replace(#{aqusitDt},'-','') ,USE_YN = 'Y' WHERE ASSET_SEQ = #{assetSeq}
UPDATE RFID_ASSET SET ASSET_STATUS_CD = '가자산' ,USE_YN = 'N' WHERE ASSET_SEQ = #{assetSeq}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM RFID_ASSET WHERE ASSET_SEQ = #{assetSeq} AND ASSET_STATUS_CD = '가자산'
